channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Ivy Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Ivy Plugin

item.title: CVE-2023-41938|2023-10-24T12:51:48.345Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20ivy%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Ivy Plugin 2.5 and earlier allows attackers to delete disabled modules.
